name: Rise Of A Hero
description:
Clear the areas captured by terrorists in Syria from terrorists and rescue the hostages.
Clear the area by killing the enemies with the various weapons you have acquired.
Currently there are 4 different levels in the game, clear all the enemies on the map and finish the level.
Apart from this, there is also Jetpack in the game. In this way, you can go to high places and use the sniper rifle or try other tactical attack methods.
